thread.title: 6 celebrity homes YOU can stay in: From Mariah Carey's beach house to Jimi Hendrix's exotic retreat
thread.title_full: 6 celebrity homes YOU can stay in: From Mariah Carey's beach house to Jimi Hendrix's exotic retreat

title: 6 celebrity homes YOU can stay in: From Mariah Carey's beach house to Jimi Hendrix's exotic retreat
text:
MARIAH Carey , Jimi Hendrix and Julie Andrews have some of the most luxurious houses on the planet. 
But it turns out the rich and famous aren't the only ones who can enjoy the best of the world's real estate. You can stay in Mariah's house [Rex] 
Air B&B have helped us find ALL the celeb homes available for YOU to stay in. 
Take a look and start your wishlist… 
1. The Rubber House The Rubber House [PR] 
Who lived there: It was built for choreographer Eugene Loring (who danced with Audrey Hepburn ) and it’s also the former home of William Defoe and Julie Andrews. That's got to be a reason to visit, right? 
Where: New York 
Description: "An architectural case study home nestled in prehistoric boulders, the Rubber House is a creative retreat available to artists, performers, academics, designers and anyone else seeking inspiration, calm and convivial seclusion." 
Sleeps: 4 
Cost: It's yours for a cool £337 a night. 
2. The adorable Garden Gingerbread House Jimi's house [PR] 
Who lived there: Jimi Hendrix stayed in when he was on Maui in the 1970's to film Rainbow Bridge 
Where: Makawao 
Description: "Romantic hideaway! This property has the lush beauty and privacy of Hana, without the drive!" 
Sleeps: 2
